dao

Class VocabularyEntry

  • java.lang.Object
    • dao.VocabularyEntry

  • public class VocabularyEntry
extends java.lang.Object
    A vocabulary entry stores a term's ID and the associated documentFrequency.

      • increaseDocFrequencyByOne

        public void increaseDocFrequencyByOne(int docID)
        Parameters:
        docID - The ID of the document that causes the docFrequency to be increased by 1. This ID is saved s.t. additional calls with the same ID will not increase the docFrequency any further. This assumes that tokens are processed one document at a time.
